recipe.title: Multifaceted Avocado Toast (Scorpio) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon ; everything seasoning, bagel seasoning

steps.step: Peel the avocado half, then slice lengthwise.
Spread the mayonnaise over the toast. Top with the sliced avocado, bacon, and tomato. Sprinkle with the everything bagel seasoning.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Peel the avocado half, then slice lengthwise.
Spread the mayonnaise over the toast.
Top with the sliced avocado, bacon, and tomato.
Sprinkle with the everything bagel seasoning.
